If you wish to register for this online course, please send an email to iice@gms.ndhu.edu.tw, before 12/01, and we will proceed with the nomination process on your behalf.

The program is scheduled to run from January 22 to February 2, 2024, for two weeks.
The KNU Online Winter School is designed to provide an exceptional intercultural experience by bringing together students and academics from different parts of the world.
It offers courses on the Korean language and culture, taught in either English or Korean. and students will have the opportunity to interact with participants from diverse cultural backgrounds.

•	PROGRAM OVERVIEW
   - Eligibility: Students who are currently enrolled in university/college and pursuing the undergraduate or graduate course & can access ZOOM and YouTube.
   - Length: January 22 - February 2, 2024 [2 weeks, 3 credits]

•	NOMINATION DEADLINE: December 6, 202

•	PAYMENT & ONLINE APPLICATION DEADLINE: December 13, 2023

•	PROGRAM
Korean Cultural Class	Korean Language Class	Group Activity
- Campus Life
- City Tour
- Korean Life Style
- Food	- K-pop
- Movie/Drama
- Sports
- Hanbok, Traditional Holidays	- Level 1 (Basic)
- Level 2 (Intermediate)	Group Meeting
with International Students


•	APPLICATION PROCESS
- Students must be nominated by their home universities via knusummer@knu.ac.kr before submitting the online application.

- Applicants will receive an ID and PASSWORD with the link to access the online application website right after the nomination.
- Complete the payment.
- Submit the online application and upload a copy of the program fee payment receipt by December 13, 2023.
- All admitted students will receive program guidelines and methods of participation via email in early January.

•	PROGRAM FEE：50 USD

   - Make sure program fees are transferred under the name of the participant
   - Transfer commission must be paid by applicants
   - If one person has paid the participation fees on behalf of multiple individuals, please inform us of the payer's name and the list of payees by sending an email to knusummer@knu.ac.kr

•	CANCELLATION & REFUND POLICY
100% Refund	On or Before December 31, 2023
50% Refund	January 1 - January 5, 2024
No Refund	After January 5, 2024

   - Except for instances of serious illness or other acceptable reasons determined by the university, there will be no refund for cancellation.
   - Cancellation requests should be made by email to knusummer@knu.ac.kr
   - Please note that bank transfer charges will be deducted from the total amount refunded.
